title: Best of The Herd for May 26, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 26, 2020
description:
It makes sense that MJ and others didn't want Isiah Thomas on the Dream Team

Ratings for The Match are telling you what changes Golf should make

Changing the NBA playoff format makes a lot of sense

Tua has an "it" quality that can't be easily defined


Guest: Jack McCallum, Sports Illustrated Writer and Author

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
